00047 template<unsigned DIM>
00048 class LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce : public GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM>
00049 {
00050     friend class TestLinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce;
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00055     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00062     template<class Archive>
00063     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00064     {
00065         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM> >(*this);
00066         archive & mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00067         archive & mUseMutantSprings;
00068         archive & mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00069         archive & mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00070         archive & mUseBCatSprings;
00071         archive & mUseApoptoticSprings;
00072         archive & mBetaCatSpringScaler;
00073         archive & mApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness;
00074         archive & mApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness;
00075     }
00076 
00077 protected:
00078 
00080     bool mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00081 
00083     bool mUseMutantSprings;
00084 
00086     double mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00087 
00089     double mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00090 
00092     bool mUseBCatSprings;
00093 
00095     bool mUseApoptoticSprings;
00096 
00098     double mBetaCatSpringScaler;
00099 
00101     double mApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness;
00102 
00104     double mApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness;
00105

00107

00112

00117 
00123     void SetEdgeBasedSpringConstant(bool useEdgeBasedSpringConstant);
00124 
00133     void SetMutantSprings(bool useMutantSprings, double mutantMutantMultiplier=2, double normalMutantMultiplier=1.5);
00134 
00140     void SetBetaCateninSprings(bool useBCatSprings);
00141

00163                                                       unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex,

00165                                                       bool isCloserThanRestLength);

00173
